One will immediately awaken from concentration and be unable to accomplish it.
If the mind is resentful, hateful, or irritated, then it will lead to the illness of qi congestion.
If one enters deep concentration and there is a loud sound or touch,
Although the sound is outside, it is in the body.
The sound may be above the sense objects.
This person wants to emerge from concentration but cannot emerge.
The mind is in the body, fearful and confused, and only then can one emerge.
It causes people to get a distended stomach.
Or if there is blood diarrhea, being touched by something leads to illness.
It is the same.
The method of treatment is also to regulate the breath as in the previous method.
If anger arises, it cannot be treated.
Sometimes when killing, at the beginning of sitting,
If the feces and urine are not passed, and the qi rises upward and pulls downward,
Recite the Anapanasati mantra and it will be cured.
When first sitting, various things arise, and people come to disturb.
Or slander the Buddha Dharma, speaking in Chinese and barbarian languages that people do not understand.
This is an evil ghost entering the body, called Dhoukaya.
Recite the previous mantra and it will be cured.
The Dhoukaya spirit is yellow in color.

The method for treating sudden pain in the body is to inhale and exhale.
Question: Why does the body suddenly ache for the practitioner of Anpan?
One teacher says:
This is because of eating too much and not digesting yet, while focusing the mind. The qi is coarse and the thoughts are subtle, which causes it.
The treatment method is to reduce food for two or three days.
Control the breath to be long and contemplate the characteristics of exhalation.
After two or three days of sitting, it will be cured.
One teacher says:
This is because focusing the mind is too intense, so the qi is knotted and becomes an illness.
The treatment method is to imagine the body like rice steaming in a steamer.
Then imagine there is wind rising from the navel and coming out through the mouth.
The mouth is the face.
Turn and turn more intense, blowing the body's qi to disperse.
After dispersing, the pain in the body will immediately heal.
After several days, you must eat fatty food and avoid seeing wind.
Also, the method of treatment is before eating.
In a secluded room, be sure not to hear any sounds.
Relax the four limbs and adjust the breath through the mouth five times.
After two or three days of sitting, it will be cured.
It is also said that when first sitting, the moving wind is still strong.
If you do not take precautions, then quickly grasp the body as if stopping the wind.
The body stopping the wind and the moving wind struggle for strength.
The method of treatment requires moving from slow to gradually faster up to five li.
Return and again from fast to slow, then sit.
Long exhale the breath four or five times.
Relax the four limbs and let go of the mind for a while.
Again inhale the breath two or three times, do not let the ears hear any sounds.
Again, let the mind be as before for the duration of one meal.
Then, focus the mind until one sitting, and it will be cured.
